job.title: Sr. Software Engineer | VMC on Dell EMC - Opportunity for Working Remotely
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description:
Are you passionate about building great products? Want to be a part of the exploding Edge and IoT market? Want to be part of a new initiative enabling hybrid cloud? Our team is looking for experienced software development engineers and operations leaders to join the team.
VMware Cloud on Dell EMC combines the simplicity and agility of the public cloud with the security and control of on-premises infrastructure, delivered as-a-service to data center and edge locations.
This fully-managed VMware service provides simple, secure, and scalable infrastructure for customer’s on-premises datacenter and edge locations. This unique approach empowers the customer to focus on business innovation and differentiation, while VMware operates the entire infrastructure end-to-end.
For more information - see here - https://www.vmware.com/products/vmc-on-dell-emc.html
VMware Cloud on Dell EMC is a highly scalable SaaS service and provides an easy to use on-prem hyper-converged infrastructure (HCI) developed in partnership with Dell and integrated with industry-leading VMware infrastructure products - vSphere, vSAN, NSX and Velocloud.”
As a key contributor in our cloud team, you will play an instrumental role in understanding customer use cases and defining the end–to-end behavior of the solution. This solution will involve developing a highly scalable SaaS service, an easy-to-use on-prem hyper-converged infrastructure (HCI) with industry-leading software-defined networking solution, NSX, and also include our SD-WAN solution, Velocloud.
NOTE: We are recruiting for several different levels!
For COLORADO Candidates ONLY: This position has a base salary starting at 95,000. Bonus, commission, and/or equity may be eligible for this position. Additional benefits for this position can be found at https://benefits.vmware.com/. *Note: Disclosure of Colorado pay and benefits required per sb19-085.
